017package org.apache.juneau.html;
018
019import static org.apache.juneau.collections.JsonMap.*;
020
021import java.io.*;
022import java.lang.reflect.*;
023import java.nio.charset.*;
024import java.util.*;
025import java.util.function.*;
026
027import org.apache.juneau.*;
028import org.apache.juneau.collections.*;
029import org.apache.juneau.httppart.*;
030import org.apache.juneau.internal.*;
031import org.apache.juneau.serializer.*;
032import org.apache.juneau.svl.*;
033
034/**
035 * Context object that lives for the duration of a single serialization of {@link HtmlSerializer} and its subclasses.
036 *
037 * <p>
038 * See {@link Serializer} for details.
039 *
040 * <h5 class='section'>Notes:</h5><ul>
041 *    <li class='warn'>This class is not thread safe and is typically discarded after one use.
042 * </ul>
043 *
044 * <h5 class='section'>See Also:</h5><ul>
045 *    <li class='link'><a class="doclink" href="https://juneau.apache.org/docs/topics/HtmlBasics">HTML Basics</a>
046
047 * </ul>
048 */
049public class HtmlDocSerializerSession extends HtmlStrippedDocSerializerSession {
050
051   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
052   // Static
053   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
054
055   private static final VarResolver DEFAULT_VR = VarResolver.create().defaultVars().vars(HtmlWidgetVar.class).build();
056
057   /**
058    * Creates a new builder for this object.
059    *
060    * @param ctx The context creating this session.
061    * @return A new builder.
062    */
063   public static Builder create(HtmlDocSerializer ctx) {
064      return new Builder(ctx);
065   }
066
067   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
068   // Builder
069   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
070
071   /**
072    * Builder class.
073    */
074   @FluentSetters
075   public static class Builder extends HtmlStrippedDocSerializerSession.Builder {
076
077      HtmlDocSerializer ctx;
078
079      /**
080       * Constructor
081       *
082       * @param ctx The context creating this session.
083       */
084      protected Builder(HtmlDocSerializer ctx) {
085         super(ctx);
086         this.ctx = ctx;
087      }
088
089      @Override
090      public HtmlDocSerializerSession build() {
091         return new HtmlDocSerializerSession(this);
092      }
093
094      // <FluentSetters>
095
096      @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.ContextSession.Builder */
097      public <T> Builder apply(Class<T> type, Consumer<T> apply) {
098         super.apply(type, apply);
099         return this;
100      }
101
102      @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.ContextSession.Builder */
103      public Builder debug(Boolean value) {
104         super.debug(value);
105         return this;
106      }
107
108      @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.ContextSession.Builder */
109      public Builder properties(Map<String,Object> value) {
110         super.properties(value);
111         return this;
112      }
113
114      @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.ContextSession.Builder */
115      public Builder property(String key, Object value) {
116         super.property(key, value);
117         return this;
118      }
119
120      @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.ContextSession.Builder */
121      public Builder unmodifiable() {
122         super.unmodifiable();
123         return this;
124      }
125
126      @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.BeanSession.Builder */
127      public Builder locale(Locale value) {
128         super.locale(value);
129         return this;
130      }
131
132      @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.BeanSession.Builder */
133      public Builder localeDefault(Locale value) {
134         super.localeDefault(value);
135         return this;
136      }
137
138      @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.BeanSession.Builder */
139      public Builder mediaType(MediaType value) {
140         super.mediaType(value);
141         return this;
142      }
143
144      @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.BeanSession.Builder */
145      public Builder mediaTypeDefault(MediaType value) {
146         super.mediaTypeDefault(value);
147         return this;
148      }
149
150      @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.BeanSession.Builder */
151      public Builder timeZone(TimeZone value) {
152         super.timeZone(value);
153         return this;
154      }
155
156      @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.BeanSession.Builder */
157      public Builder timeZoneDefault(TimeZone value) {
158         super.timeZoneDefault(value);
159         return this;
160      }
161
162      @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.serializer.SerializerSession.Builder */
163      public Builder javaMethod(Method value) {
164         super.javaMethod(value);
165         return this;
166      }
167
168      @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.serializer.SerializerSession.Builder */
169      public Builder resolver(VarResolverSession value) {
170         super.resolver(value);
171         return this;
172      }
173
174      @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.serializer.SerializerSession.Builder */
175      public Builder schema(HttpPartSchema value) {
176         super.schema(value);
177         return this;
178      }
179
180      @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.serializer.SerializerSession.Builder */
181      public Builder schemaDefault(HttpPartSchema value) {
182         super.schemaDefault(value);
183         return this;
184      }
185
186      @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.serializer.SerializerSession.Builder */
187      public Builder uriContext(UriContext value) {
188         super.uriContext(value);
189         return this;
190      }
191
192      @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.serializer.WriterSerializerSession.Builder */
193      public Builder fileCharset(Charset value) {
194         super.fileCharset(value);
195         return this;
196      }
197
198      @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.serializer.WriterSerializerSession.Builder */
199      public Builder streamCharset(Charset value) {
200         super.streamCharset(value);
201         return this;
202      }
203
204      @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.serializer.WriterSerializerSession.Builder */
205      public Builder useWhitespace(Boolean value) {
206         super.useWhitespace(value);
207         return this;
208      }
209
210      // </FluentSetters>
211   }
212
213   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
214   // Instance
215   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
216
217   /**
218    * Constructor.
219    *
220    * @param builder The builder for this object.
221    */
222   protected HtmlDocSerializerSession(Builder builder) {
223      super(builder);
224      ctx = builder.ctx;
225      addVarBean(HtmlWidgetMap.class, ctx.getWidgets());
226   }
227
228   private final HtmlDocSerializer ctx;
229
230   @Override /* SerializerSession */
231   protected VarResolverSession createDefaultVarResolverSession() {
232      return DEFAULT_VR.createSession();
233   }
234
235   /**
236    * Returns the {@link HtmlDocSerializer.Builder#navlinks(String...)} setting value in this context.
237    *
238    * @return
239    *    The {@link HtmlDocSerializer.Builder#navlinks(String...)} setting value in this context.
240    *    <jk>null</jk> if not specified.
241    *    Never an empty map.
242    */
243   public final String[] getNavLinks() {
244      return ctx.navlinks;
245   }
246
247   @Override /* Serializer */
248   protected void doSerialize(SerializerPipe out, Object o) throws IOException, SerializeException {
249
250      try (HtmlWriter w = getHtmlWriter(out)) {
251         try {
252            getTemplate().writeTo(this, w, o);
253         } catch (Exception e) {
254            throw new SerializeException(e);
255         }
256      }
257   }
258
259   /**
260    * Calls the parent {@link #doSerialize(SerializerPipe, Object)} method which invokes just the HTML serializer.
261    *
262    * @param out
263    *    Where to send the output from the serializer.
264    * @param o The object being serialized.
265    * @throws Exception Error occurred during serialization.
266    */
267   public void parentSerialize(Object out, Object o) throws Exception {
268      try (SerializerPipe pipe = createPipe(out)) {
269         super.doSerialize(pipe, o);
270      }
271   }
272   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
273   // Properties
274   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
275
276   /**
277    * Aside section contents.
278    *
279    * @see HtmlDocSerializer.Builder#aside(String...)
280    * @return
281    *    The overridden contents of the aside section on the HTML page.
282    */
283   protected final String[] getAside() {
284      return ctx.aside;
285   }
286
287   /**
288    * Aside section contents float.
289    *
290    * @see HtmlDocSerializer.Builder#asideFloat(AsideFloat)
291    * @return
292    *    The location of where to place the aside section.
293    */
294   protected final AsideFloat getAsideFloat() {
295      return ctx.asideFloat;
296   }
297
298   /**
299    * Footer section contents.
300    *
301    * @see HtmlDocSerializer.Builder#footer(String...)
302    * @return
303    *    The overridden contents of the footer section on the HTML page.
304    */
305   protected final String[] getFooter() {
306      return ctx.footer;
307   }
308
309   /**
310    * Additional head section content.
311    *
312    * @see HtmlDocSerializer.Builder#head(String...)
313    * @return
314    *    HTML content to add to the head section of the HTML page.
315    */
316   protected final String[] getHead() {
317      return ctx.head;
318   }
319
320   /**
321    * Header section contents.
322    *
323    * @see HtmlDocSerializer.Builder#header(String...)
324    * @return
325    *    The overridden contents of the header section on the HTML page.
326    */
327   protected final String[] getHeader() {
328      return ctx.header;
329   }
330
331   /**
332    * Nav section contents.
333    *
334    * @see HtmlDocSerializer.Builder#nav(String...)
335    * @return
336    *    The overridden contents of the nav section on the HTML page.
337    */
338   protected final String[] getNav() {
339      return ctx.nav;
340   }
341
342   /**
343    * Page navigation links.
344    *
345    * @see HtmlDocSerializer.Builder#navlinks(String...)
346    * @return
347    *    Navigation links to add to the HTML page.
348    */
349   protected final String[] getNavlinks() {
350      return ctx.navlinks;
351   }
352
353   /**
354    * No-results message.
355    *
356    * @see HtmlDocSerializer.Builder#noResultsMessage(String)
357    * @return
358    *    The message used when serializing an empty array or empty list.
359    */
360   protected final String getNoResultsMessage() {
361      return ctx.getNoResultsMessage();
362   }
363
364   /**
365    * Prevent word wrap on page.
366    *
367    * @see HtmlDocSerializer.Builder#nowrap()
368    * @return
369    *    <jk>true</jk> if <js>"* {white-space:nowrap}"</js> should be added to the CSS instructions on the page to prevent word wrapping.
370    */
371   protected final boolean isNowrap() {
372      return ctx.nowrap;
373   }
374
375   /**
376    * Resolve $ variables in serialized POJO.
377    *
378    * @see HtmlDocSerializer.Builder#resolveBodyVars()
379    * @return
380    *    <jk>true</jk> if $ variables in serialized POJO should be resolved.
381    */
382   protected final boolean isResolveBodyVars() {
383      return ctx.resolveBodyVars;
384   }
385
386   /**
387    * Javascript code.
388    *
389    * @see HtmlDocSerializer.Builder#script(String...)
390    * @return
391    *    Arbitrary Javascript to add to the HTML page.
392    */
393   protected final String[] getScript() {
394      return ctx.script;
395   }
396
397   /**
398    * CSS style code.
399    *
400    * @see HtmlDocSerializer.Builder#style(String...)
401    * @return
402    *    The CSS instructions to add to the HTML page.
403    */
404   protected final String[] getStyle() {
405      return ctx.style;
406   }
407
408   /**
409    * Stylesheet import URLs.
410    *
411    * @see HtmlDocSerializer.Builder#stylesheet(String...)
412    * @return
413    *    The link to the stylesheet of the HTML page.
414    */
415   protected final String[] getStylesheet() {
416      return ctx.stylesheet;
417   }
418
419   /**
420    * HTML document template.
421    *
422    * @see HtmlDocSerializer.Builder#template(Class)
423    * @return
424    *    The template to use for serializing the page.
425    */
426   protected final HtmlDocTemplate getTemplate() {
427      return ctx.getTemplate();
428   }
429
430   /**
431    * Performs an action on all widgets defined in his session.
432    *
433    * @param action The action to perform.
434    * @see HtmlDocSerializer.Builder#widgets(Class...)
435    * @return This object.
436    */
437   protected final HtmlDocSerializerSession forEachWidget(Consumer<HtmlWidget> action) {
438      ctx.forEachWidget(action);
439      return this;
440   }
441
442   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
443   // Other methods
444   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
445
446   @Override /* ContextSession */
447   protected JsonMap properties() {
448      return filteredMap("ctx", ctx, "varResolver", getVarResolver());
449   }
450}
